meanings.def: likely to happen, to exist or to be true
examples: It is probable that the disease has a genetic element.
The two outcomes are equally probable.
The probable cause of the fire was an electrical fault.
It is quite probable that they will call an election next spring.

meanings.def: a person or an animal that is likely to win a race or to be chosen for a team
examples: All four players are probables for the national team.
